doc.description:
Driver for a PWM based sonar range sensor Reads sensor using PWM input and outputs sonar distance to object in [cm]
Why PWM over ADC: One only needs to connect GND, VCC and one more signal wire, same as ADC but not the disadvantages of ADC sensors noise
Sensor example: Maxbotix LV-EZ1

configure.name: SONAR_PWM_CHANNEL
configure.description: Select PWM input channel for sensor to use e.g. PWM_INPUT1

define.name: USE_SONAR
define.description: Activate use of sonar in INS extended filter (only rotorcraft) or not if one only wants to measure distance

define.name: SONAR_OFFSET
define.description: Sensor offset in CM, as in where one onts zero to be, default is 0

define.name: SONAR_MIN_RANGE
define.description: If defined, set limit to minimum value reported, default 0.15

define.name: SONAR_MAX_RANGE
define.description: If defined, set limit to maximum value reported, default 6.0

define.name: SONAR_COMPENSATE_ROTATION
define.description: Compensate AGL for body rotation, if not defined, defaults to FALSE

define.name: SONAR_UPDATE_ON_AGL
define.description: Updates the AGL value in state,if not defined, defaults to FALSE

define.name: SONAR_PWM_PERIOD
define.description: period in microsec (e.g. 4096 for 12 bits sensor)

define.name: SONAR_PWM_OFFSET
define.description: initial offset on the raw pwm signal if needed (default: 820usec)

define.name: SONAR_USE_PWM_FILTER
define.description: Enable or disable a median filter on the sensor output values

define.name: SONAR_MEDIAN_SIZE
define.description: If median filter is enabled then set this option to filter the output more(or less), default is 7

define.name: SENSOR_SYNC_SEND_SONAR
define.description: If defined, sends raw and scaled sonar values, useful for debugging sensor issues
